entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 3.

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
